name: Cellular Automata Playground
shortDesc: A tool to explore life-like cellular automata.

name: TempoGDX
shortDesc: An open source metronome app built with libGDX.

name: Map of Thedas
shortDesc: A searchable map of Thedas - the Dragon Age world.

name: Karcero
shortDesc: A procedural dungeon tile based map generator.

name: Game of Music
shortDesc: Game of Music is a music sequencer that uses Conway's Game of Life's rules to generate each state. Build and share a link directly to your track.

name: Super Fantasy Queue
shortDesc: Made for Github's 2013 game off jam, Super Fantasy Queue is a short game about the most important decision a hero could make - which line to stand in.

name: caseIt
shortDesc: A simple web tool for text transformations designed to work with keyboard shortcuts.
